Package wiiremotej.event

Interface Summary
BalanceBoardListener Listener interface for the balance baord.
WiiDeviceDiscoveryListener Listener interface for device discovery.
WiiRemoteListener Listener interface for the remote.
 

Class Summary
BalanceBoardAdapter Implementation of BalanceBoardListener to conveniently implement just the methods you want.
BBButtonEvent Button event for Nintendo (R) Balance Board (TM).
BBCombinedEvent Combined event for Nintendo (R) Balance Board (TM).
BBDataEvent Read data event for Nintendo (R) Balance Board (TM).
BBEvent Event for Nintendo (R) Balance Board (TM).
BBMassEvent Mass event for Nintendo (R) Balance Board (TM).
BBStatusEvent Status reported event for Nintendo (R) Balance Board (TM).
WiiDeviceDiscoveredEvent An event for when a Wii Device is discovered through a nonblocking method.
WiiRemoteAdapter Implementation of WiiRemoteListener to conveniently implement just the methods you want.
WRAccelerationEvent Acceleration event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WRButtonEvent Button event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WRClassicControllerExtensionEvent Classic controller extension event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WRCombinedEvent Combined event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WRDataEvent Read data event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WREvent Event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WRExtensionEvent Extension event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WRGuitarExtensionEvent Classic controller extension event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WRIREvent IR Event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WRNunchukExtensionEvent Nunchuk extension event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
WRStatusEvent Status reported event for Nintendo (R) Wii Remote (TM).
